predictions.text: U.S. housing starts (SAAR) for August 2025 will be between 1.23 million and 1.34 million in the Census Bureau New Residential Construction release on 2025-09-18.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify the seasonally adjusted annual rate for Housing Starts (total) in the Census Bureau's New Residential Construction press release/Table 2 on 2025-09-18 falls within [1.23, 1.34] million.
monitoring_signals: Regional starts data from states with large single-family activity
predictions.rationale: Lower mortgage rates support single-family starts; mixed consumer credit trends and softer manufacturing temper upside.

predictions.text: On 2025-09-26, the Swiss National Bank will cut its policy rate by 25 basis points.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare the policy rate in the SNB Monetary Policy Assessment on 2025-09-26 to the prior meeting; a reduction of exactly 0.25 percentage points constitutes success.
monitoring_signals: CHF OIS curve and meeting-implied probabilities
predictions.rationale: Inflation remains contained and global easing bias builds; SNB likely to maintain accommodative path.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, OFAC will announce at least one sanctions designation under its Iran-related program via public press release or sanctions list update.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if U.S. Treasury OFAC posts a press release or SDN list update explicitly citing Iran-related authorities or program tags (e.g., Iran, IRGC) dated on/before 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: OFAC press room and sanctions list updates
State Department terrorism and human-rights advisories
Escalatory incidents in the Middle East involving Iran-linked groups
predictions.rationale: Escalation in the region and ongoing U.S. sanctions cadence make an Iran-related action likely.

predictions.text: The AAA-reported California state average price for regular gasoline will reach at or above $5.60 per gallon on at least one day by 2025-10-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using AAA Gas Prices state data for California, success if any daily statewide average regular grade price on/before 2025-10-15 is ≥ $5.60.
monitoring_signals: CARBOB spot prices (Los Angeles, San Francisco)
predictions.rationale: Refinery constraints and seasonal factors support higher California pump prices.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31 (UTC), NOAA SWPC will record at least one solar flare of class X1.0 or higher.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via NOAA SWPC solar event reports that an X-class (≥X1.0) flare is listed with date/time on or before 2025-10-31 (UTC).
predictions.rationale: High solar-cycle activity increases the odds of at least one X-class flare in the window.

predictions.text: Germany Ifo Business Climate index for September 2025 will print between 84.0 and 87.0 in the release on 2025-09-25.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify the headline Ifo Business Climate index value on ifo.de's official press release for September 2025 falls within [84.0, 87.0].
predictions.rationale: Persistent manufacturing softness and materials constraints keep sentiment subdued but not collapsing.

predictions.text: EUR/USD (Yahoo Finance: EURUSD=X) will close at or above 1.0900 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Using Yahoo Finance daily historical data for EURUSD=X (UTC close), success if any close on/before 2025-11-30 is ≥ 1.0900.
predictions.rationale: Markets price Fed easing; narrowing rate differentials and improved risk appetite can lift EUR.

predictions.text: LME 3-month Nickel official settlement price will reach at or above $19,000 per metric ton on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check the London Metal Exchange Official Prices for Nickel 3-Month; success if any official 3M settlement on/before 2025-11-30 is ≥ $19,000/mt.
monitoring_signals: Indonesian supply policy and mine output
Stainless steel and battery sector demand
predictions.rationale: Tightness risk and cyclical stabilization can spark upside tests despite supply growth.

predictions.text: Chicago Fed National Activity Index (CFNAI) for August 2025 will print between -0.20 and +0.15 in the release on 2025-09-23.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify the single-summary CFNAI value on the Chicago Fed website for August 2025 lies within [-0.20, +0.15].
predictions.rationale: Mixed activity data suggest near-trend growth, keeping CFNAI near zero with modest downside risk.

predictions.text: UK GfK Consumer Confidence index for September 2025 will be at or above -13 in the release due by 2025-09-20.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm the headline GfK Consumer Confidence index level in the September 2025 press release on or before 2025-09-20 is ≥ -13.
monitoring_signals: UK inflation prints and BoE guidance
Retail sales and card spending data
predictions.rationale: Improving rate outlook and investment announcements support sentiment stabilization.

predictions.text: NYMEX RBOB gasoline front-month futures will settle at or above $2.60 per gallon on at least one trading day by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use CME Group official daily settlement for the front-month RB contract; success if any settlement on/before 2025-10-31 is ≥ $2.60/gal.
monitoring_signals: EIA gasoline inventories and refinery utilization
West Coast refinery outages and CARB specifications
predictions.rationale: Refinery tightness and seasonal demand can lift gasoline cracks and futures toward late-season highs.

predictions.text: U.S. ISM Manufacturing New Orders Index for September 2025 will print at or above 49.0 in the 2025-10-01 release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check the ISM Manufacturing Report On Business for September 2025; success if the New Orders subindex is ≥ 49.0.
monitoring_signals: Regional Fed manufacturing surveys (Empire, Philly, Richmond, Dallas)
S&P Global US Manufacturing PMI new orders
predictions.rationale: Stabilizing demand and inventory normalization support an improvement toward the 50 threshold.

predictions.text: China Total Social Financing (TSF) for September 2025 will be at or above CNY 3.2 trillion in the PBoC release by 2025-10-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in PBoC monthly data that Aggregate Financing to the Real Economy for September 2025 is ≥ CNY 3.2T.
monitoring_signals: PBoC liquidity operations and RRR moves
Property sales and mortgage rate policies
predictions.rationale: Easing measures and targeted support should keep credit flows resilient into Q4.
